instructions: Please take a moment to complete the survey. Your answers will help us better understand the needs of today's smokers. In return, we'll include you on our list of people who like to receive special and unadvertised offers from America's best-known cigarette brands.

questions.question: How many times did you use money-off coupons for cigarettes?
